author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: Teo Song Kwang (alias Teo Richard) and Another v Vijayasundram Jeyabalan
counsel: Oon Thian Seng and Sophia Saw (T S Oon and Bazul) for the plaintiffs; Leong Wai Nam and Jamilah Ibrahim (Wong M Seow and JYP Chia) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Credit and Security/Guarantees and indemnities/Co-guarantors/Separate guarantee documents executed/Whether separate guarantee documents part of same transaction/Whether co-guarantor consulted on settlement agreement/Whether co-guarantor liable under settlement agreement
